alert.note: Alert for Dorado; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 06 at 7:09PM AST until February 06 at 9:15PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Dorado in Puerto Rico... Toa Alta in Puerto Rico... Toa Baja in Puerto Rico... Vega Alta in Puerto Rico... Vega Baja in Puerto Rico... * Until 915 PM AST. * At 709 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch is possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Mudslides. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Dorado; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja
